title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From collecting tools to an autonomous SOC (SEC206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从工具收集到自主SOC (SEC206)
abstract: The vision of an autonomous SOC feels unattainable amid a federated array of security tools. This session demonstrates a practical path forward, focused on outcomes. The key is not to replace tools, but to unify them with an AI-powered platform that automates detection and response to empower security teams in unprecedented ways. Through a real-world demonstration of the latest Purple AI innovations, see how to transform siloed data into the foundation for an autonomous security posture. Learn how to advance SOC maturity and achieve superior security outcomes across your AWS environment. This presentation is brought to you by SentinelOne, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 自主SOC的愿景在联合安全工具阵列中似乎难以实现。本次会议展示了一条注重成果的实用前进道路。关键不是替换工具，而是通过AI驱动的平台统一这些工具，自动化检测和响应，以前所未有的方式赋能安全团队。通过Purple AI最新创新的真实演示，了解如何将孤立的数据转化为自主安全态势的基础。学习如何提升SOC成熟度，在AWS环境中实现卓越的安全成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SentinelOne提供。
